treatment-md.title: Phascogale tapoatafa subsp. wambenger Have, 2015, subsp. nov.
treatment-md.article-title: Taxonomic revision of Phascogale tapoatafa (Meyer, 1793) (Dasyuridae; Marsupialia), including descriptions of two new subspecies and confirmation of P. pirata Thomas, 1904 as a ‘ Top End’ endemic
